Package net.kuujo.vertigo.cluster

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cluster
    The cluster is a low level API for deployments and shared data access.
    ClusterManager
    The cluster manager handles deployment and undeployment of complete or partial Vertigo networks and provides an interface for accessing existing networks in the Vertigo cluster.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterFactory
    Factory for creating clusters for deployment and shared data access.
    ClusterManagerFactory
    Factory for creating cluster managers.
    HazelcastCluster
    Hazelcast cluster verticle.
    LocalCluster
    Local cluster implementation.
    LocalClusterManager
    Local cluster manager implementation.
    RemoteCluster
    Hazelcast-based cluster implementation.
    RemoteClusterManager
    Hazelcast-based cluster manager implementation.
    XyncCluster
    Xync-based cluster implementation.
    XyncClusterManager
    Xync-based cluster manager implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ClusterScope
    Enumerated types for Vertigo cluster scopes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DeploymentException
    Deployment exception.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ClusterType
    Annotates a handler as being available in cluster mode.
    ClusterTypeInfo
    Annotates a handler as only being available in cluster mode.
    LocalType
    Annotates a handler as being available in local mode.
    LocalTypeInfo
    Annotates a handler as only being available in local mode.
    XyncType
    Annotates a handler as being available in Xync mode.
    XyncTypeInfo
    Annotates a handler as only being available in cluster mode.
